title: New: Child Ivory – Rhetoric / Angie
content:
Two blissful new tracks from Utah’s Child Ivory, one of my favourite new discoveries of the year.

Rhetoric especially is refreshingly honest as a track, seamlessly merging some classically influenced songwriting with a very 80’s-esque production style, it still manages to come across as truly authentic and natural. Accompanied by a brilliant video shot in Taiwan with local actors, there’s elements of everyone from Phil Collins to M83 to Rhetoric. Check it out below alongside their other recent single, Angie.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
